attributes.action: Set up an independent ombudsman  to ensure ethical behaviour by MP's
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is the gross misuse and out and out falsehoods used in the recent referendum
attributes.background: Based on the deplorable and unethical behaviour by political figures in the recent referendum we the people call for an independent ombudsman with the power to gag and/or imprison political figures for lying to the people.

rejection.details:
We think you might want the same action as this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139800
